text: The current spouse of the President of Croatia is Sanja Musić Milanović (born 1969), the wife of President Zoran Milanović, who took office on 19 February 2020. The current spouse of the Prime Minister of Croatia is Ana Maslać Plenković (born 1979), the wife of Prime Minister Andrej Plenković. == Spouses of presidents == (*) as spouse of the President of the Presidency of SR Croatia (**) Spouses of Speakers of Parliament as Acting Presidents {| class="wikitable" |- ! # ! title: List of spouses of Presidents of Croatia
